headline.main: STAY IS EXPECTED IN FRENCH KILLINGS; Clues Provided Paris Police on Assassination of Nazis May Save 100 Hostages

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 26 -- The execution of 100 more Frenchmen in Nantes and Bordeaux in reprisal for the killing of two German officers may yet be stayed. Such were the indications tonight in dispatches from Paris through German censorship that said information furnished by various French sources had narrowed the scope of the inquiries into the killing of officers at Nantes and Bordeaux.
abstract: Franco-German collaboration threatened by killing of hostages in occupied France
